source:
%%sql
-- DBXDH.DHT_CAMPUS definition
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS etlhubConfirmed.DHT_CAMPUS  (	
CAMPUS_KEY INT NOT NULL,
VERSION INT NOT NULL ,
GEOGRAPHY_ID VARCHAR(5),
GEOGRAPHY_NAME VARCHAR(64),
REGION_ID VARCHAR(8),
REGION_NAME VARCHAR(64),
SITE_ID VARCHAR(8),
SITE_NAME VARCHAR(64),
WORLD_REGION_CODE VARCHAR(2),
WORLD_REGION_NAME VARCHAR(64),
MARKET_TEAM_REGION_CODE VARCHAR(3),
MARKET_TEAM_REGION_NAME VARCHAR(64),
COUNTRY_CODE VARCHAR(2),
COUNTRY_NAME VARCHAR(64),
CAMPUS_ID VARCHAR(8),
CAMPUS_NAME VARCHAR(64),
CAMPUS_STATUS VARCHAR(32),
WORK_LOCATION_CODE VARCHAR(3),
ADDRESS VARCHAR(256),
CITY VARCHAR(64),
STATE_PROVINCE_ID VARCHAR(3),
STATE_PROVINCE_NAME VARCHAR(64),
POSTAL_CODE VARCHAR(16),
LATITUDE DECIMAL(11,8),
LONGITUDE DECIMAL(11,8),
UTC_OFFSET VARCHAR(16),
ICU_TIME_ZONE VARCHAR(64),
PEOPLE_HOUSED_FLAG VARCHAR(1),
REMOTE_SUPPORT_FLAG VARCHAR(1),
PRIMARY_CAMPUS_USE_NAME VARCHAR(32),
PRIMARY_CAMPUS_USE_DESCR VARCHAR(128),
CAMPUS_OWNERSHIP VARCHAR(8),
CAMPUS_ACTIVATION_YEAR INTEGER,
CAMPUS_INACTIVATION_YEAR INTEGER,
CURRENT_IND	VARCHAR(1), -- Y for active row and N for all rows expired
EXTRACT_DT TIMESTAMP, -- Load Cycle date, contains same value for all the records inserted in a single batch
REC_START_DT TIMESTAMP, --SCD TYpe 2 start date
REC_END_DT TIMESTAMP, -- SCD Type 2 End date, will have high date (9999-12-31) for active dimensional row
SOURCE_SYSTEM STRING, -- Name of the source system
REC_CHECKSUM STRING, -- Hash value of all dimensional columns. Used to identify changed records 
IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP, --Timestamp of when the record got updated in table
IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP --Timestamp of when the record got inserted in table
)
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (CURRENT_IND)
LOCATION 'abfss://etlhubfilestorage@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/deltalake/dimensions/DHT_CAMPUS'
